# Draft:Vijayalakshmi Ishwarappa Balekundri

----
Vijayalakshmi Ishwarappa Balekundri is an Indian pediatric cardiologist and medical educator from Karnataka. She was associated with the Sri Jayadeva Institute of Cardiovascular Sciences and Research in Bengaluru and received the Rajyotsava Award in 2008 for her contributions to medicine.
Early life and education
Dr. Vijayalakshmi Balekundri was born in Belagavi, Karnataka. She studied at R.L. Science Institute in Belagavi, where she received an award for all-round performance. She later completed her MBBS, MD in General Medicine, and DM in Cardiology from Bangalore University. According to the Medical Education and Research Trust, she received multiple academic awards during her training, including a gold medal in cardiology.
Career
Dr. Vijayalakshmi Balekundri worked for several decades in cardiology, particularly pediatric cardiology, at the Sri Jayadeva Institute of Cardiovascular Sciences and Research. She was involved in clinical procedures, including interventional techniques, and contributed to the training of postgraduate and doctoral-level medical students.
She has published in academic journals and co-authored several texts related to pediatric cardiology and congenital heart disease. Her work includes research on congenital and rheumatic heart diseases and interventional cardiology.
Recognition
Dr. Vijayalakshmi Balekundri received the Rajyotsava Award in 2008 from the Government of Karnataka for her contributions to medicine.
She has been recognized by professional bodies and served as president of the Cardiological Society of India – Karnataka Chapter and the Indian Academy of Echocardiography.
Professional affiliations
Balekundri has held positions in professional medical organizations in India. She served as President of the Indian Academy of Echocardiography (IAE) during the 2021–22 term and later as Immediate Past President in 2023–24. She is also a trustee of the Medical Education and Research Trust (MERT), which lists her among its office bearers and notes her academic distinctions in cardiology.
Social engagement
Dr. Vijayalakshmi Balekundri has participated in health education campaigns, particularly related to tobacco and alcohol awareness. She has authored several Kannada-language books intended for public health outreach.
